flawed_nl_solution:
If Ron is 43 now, he will be 43+5 = <<43+5=52>>52 years old in five years.
After five years, Ron will be four times as old as Maurice, meaning Maurice will be 52/4 =<<52/4=13>>13 years old then.
Currently, Maurice is 13-5 = <<13-5=8>>8 years old.
